item.description:
Come enjoy an afternoon of hookah (arguileh) and Arabic conversation at Nile Lounge in Allston! The lounge offers a wide variety of tobacco flavors, as well as some light snacks and beverages. We will meet at 4:00 PM. If taking the T, take the B train on the Green Line to Packard's corner. Walk about 3 blocks down Brighton Avenue. Nile Lounge is at the intersection of Brighton Ave. and Chester St. on the left. Look forward to seeing you there!
For more info on Nile Lounge, including a map please go to http://www.nilelounge...
*Please note: This event is for ages 18+ only*
item.name: Arabic chat and hookah at Nile Lounge
